@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+build/*
+dist/*
+node_modules/*
+liferay-npm-bundler-report.html
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+.npmbuildrc
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+# common-angular-js-new
+
+Common Angular Js New
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+{
+	"name": "common-angular-js-new",
+	"version": "1.0.0",
+	"description": "Common Angular Js New",
+	"devDependencies": {
+		"liferay-npm-bundler": "^2.24.0",
+		"liferay-npm-build-support": "^2.24.0",
+		"babel-cli": "6.26.0",
+		"babel-preset-env": "1.7.0"
+	},
+	"dependencies": {
+		"@angular/animations": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/common": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/compiler": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/core": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/forms": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/platform-browser": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/platform-browser-dynamic": "11.2.4",
+		"@angular/router": "11.2.4",
+		"rxjs": "6.6.3",
+		"tslib": "2.0.3",
+		"core-js": "^2.5.1",
+		"zone.js": "0.10.3"
+	},
+	"scripts": {
+		"build": "babel --source-maps -d build src && npm run copy-assets && liferay-npm-bundler",
+		"copy-assets": "lnbs-copy-assets",
+		"deploy": "npm run build && lnbs-deploy",
+		"translate": "lnbs-translate"
+	},
+	"main": "index.js"
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+/**
+ * Place any initialization of this shared bundle in this function. That way, 
+ * you can run:
+ *
+ * 		require('common-angular-js-new');
+ *
+ * in your dependent projects, before using this shared bundle and you will make
+ * sure that this code is executed once.
+ */
+export default function init() {
+}
+console.log('Bootstrapped common-angular-js Angular 11'); 
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 build/*
 dist/*
 node_modules/*
-liferay-npm-bundler-report.html
\ No newline at end of file
+liferay-npm-bundler-report.html
+/build/

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+.gradle/
+build/
+target/
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+Bundle-Name: login-filter
+Bundle-SymbolicName: login.filter
+Bundle-Version: 1.0.0

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+dependencies {
+	compileOnly group: "com.liferay.portal", name: "com.liferay.portal.kernel"
+	compileOnly group: "org.osgi", name: "org.osgi.service.component.annotations"
+	
+	compileOnly group: "javax.servlet", name: "javax.servlet-api"
+	compileOnly group: "com.liferay", name: "com.liferay.portal.security.sso.openid.connect.api"
+
+	
+	compileOnly group: "com.liferay", name: "com.liferay.configuration.admin.api"
+	compileOnly group: "com.liferay", name: "com.liferay.portal.configuration.metatype.api"
+	compile group: "biz.aQute.bnd", name: "biz.aQute.bndlib", version: "3.1.0"
+	
+	compileOnly project(":modules:userinfo-invoker")
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+package com.liferay.sagov.login.filter.configuration;
+
+import com.liferay.portal.configuration.metatype.annotations.ExtendedObjectClassDefinition;
+
+import aQute.bnd.annotation.metatype.Meta;
+
+/**
+ * @author marcialcalvo
+ */
+@ExtendedObjectClassDefinition(
+	category = "login-filter",
+	scope = ExtendedObjectClassDefinition.Scope.SYSTEM
+)
+@Meta.OCD(
+	id = "com.liferay.sagov.login.filter.configuration.LoginFilterConfiguration",
+	localization = "content/Language", name = "login-filter"
+)
+public interface LoginFilterConfiguration {
+
+	@Meta.AD(
+		deflt = "true", description = "enable-or-disable-login-filter",
+		required = false
+	)
+	public boolean filterEnabled();
+	
+	@Meta.AD(
+		deflt = "https://test-dpc-liferay-supported.apps.npe.ocp.sa.gov.au/", description = "id-verification-app",
+		required = false
+	)
+	public String idVerificationApp();
+
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+category-section.login-filter=Login Filter
+category.login-filter=Login Filter
+login-filter=Login Filter
+enable-or-disable-login-filter=Enable or disable the Login filter
+id-verification-app=Enter the URL of the ID Verification APP
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+Bundle-Name: rest-consumer-api

\ No newline at end of file
